title: Review: Swytch e-bike conversion kit adds serious motor assisted fun to any bicycle
content:
If we’re being honest, we were a bit hesitant to test the Swytch e-Bike Conversion Kit. Why? Two reasons. First, because bolting on a motor and battery seems like a clunky idea. Second, because front wheel drive seems like a weird idea on a two-wheeled, pedal-powered bicycle that’s designed as a low-power, rear wheel drive […]

The post Review: Swytch e-bike conversion kit adds serious motor assisted fun to any bicycle appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
